stimulusHtml: What are the contents of  numbers  after executing the code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following method.

 

public static void transform(ArrayList<Integer> items)
{  
    for (int i = items.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
    {
       items.add(i, items.get(i)); 
    }
}

 

The following code segment appears in a method in the same class as  transform. 

 

ArrayList<Integer> numbers = new ArrayList<Integer>();
numbers.add(15);
numbers.add(4);
numbers.add(19);
numbers.add(7);

transform(numbers);
